taskOptions.description: Greedy option for LA4Falcon. For more details on the available options, see https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/FALCON/wiki/Manual
taskOptions.name: Aggressive Mode

taskOptions.description: Approx. number of base pairs expected in the genome.  We choose many hidden settings automatically, based on this.
taskOptions.name: Genome Length

taskOptions.description: A target for the total # of bases in the 'raw' (post primary) reads, divided by the total number in the 'seed' reads.
taskOptions.name: Seed coverage

taskOptions.description: Only reads as long as this will be used as 'seeds' for the draft assembly. (Shorter reads will be used for correction and polishing, if they pass the dataset filters.) If '-1', then this will be calculated automatically, such that the total number of seed bases nearly equals GenomeLength*SeedCoverage.
taskOptions.name: Seed length cutoff

taskOptions.description: This is intended to allow support engineers to override the cfg which we will generate from other options. It is a semicolon-separated list of key=val pairs. Newlines are allowed but ignored. For more details on the available options, see https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/FALCON/wiki/Manual
taskOptions.name: FALCON cfg overrides

taskOptions.description: A semicolon or comma separated list of other filters to add to the DataSet
taskOptions.name: Filters to add to the DataSet

taskOptions.description: If greater than 1, a filter will be applied to the input dataset to reduce the number of reads by this factor.  For example, a downsampling factor of 10 means that only one tenth of the reads will be used.  This is mostly intended for internal use and debugging.
taskOptions.name: Downsampling Factor

taskOptions.description: Sample name for all read groups. Defaults, in order of precedence: SM field in input read group, biosample name, well sample name, "UnnamedSample".
taskOptions.name: Biological Sample Name

taskOptions.description: Minimum mapped read length in basepair.
taskOptions.name: Minimum Mapped Length (bp)

taskOptions.description: By default SMRT Link will consolidate chunked mapped BAM files for viewing in IGV if the combined size is no more than 10 GB.  Setting this option to true will ignore the file size cutoff and always consolidate the BAM files.  Note that this is heavily I/O bound and may result in significantly longer runtimes.
taskOptions.name: Consolidate Mapped BAMs for IGV
